item.title: Updating my now page
item.description: A /now page is a place where we add information about what are we focused on at this point of our life. It has been a while since I updated mine, so we go: Work Recently I changed jobs, work now for Vanguard X as a Python Engineer for Drakontas. A new experience, updating different GIS modules inside DragonForce, and designing new capabilities. Learning I enrolled in this Master in Big Data and Business Analytics, and will continue with other courses on my list.
